      • isPersisted

        public boolean isPersisted()
        Description copied from interface: UserPreferences
        Whether or not this UserPreferences object has had its changes persisted. Returns true even if there have been no changes.
        Specified by:
        isPersisted in interface UserPreferences

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Description copied from interface: UserPreferences
        Attempts to save the altered preferences to the DataBase if there are any. If this method fails, UserPreferences.isPersisted() will continue to return false.
        Specified by:
        flush in interface UserPreferences
